title: Clash Converter

subtitle.proxies-to-yaml: Convert proxy links to Clash YAML format
subtitle.yaml-to-proxies: Extract proxy links from Clash YAML

inputPlaceholder.proxies-to-yaml:
Paste your proxy links here - one per line

Supported protocols:

hysteria://server:port?protocol=udp&auth=xxx&peer=xxx#Hysteria-Node
hysteria2://password@server:port/?sni=xxx#Hysteria2-Node
ss://[base64]#SS-Node
ssr://[base64]#SSR-Node
vmess://[base64]#Vmess-Node
vless://uuid@server:port?encryption=none&security=tls&type=tcp#Vless-Node
trojan://password@server:port#Trojan-Node
socks5://server:port#Socks5-Node
http://user:pass@server:port#Http-Node

ðŸ’¡ Tip: The #name suffix becomes the proxy name in your YAML file
inputPlaceholder.yaml-to-proxies:
proxies:
  - name: SS-HongKong
    type: ss
    server: hk.example.com
    port: 443
  - name: VMESS-US
    type: vmess
    server: us.example.com
    port: 443

proxy-groups:
  - name: PROXY
    type: select
    proxies: ...

clash-premium.description: The original Clash core (formerly Clash for Windows kernel). No longer actively maintained.
features: Does NOT support VLESS, Hysteria, Hysteria2
Stable but outdated, last updated in 2023
Only choose if your client requires it

protocolFiltered: {count} {protocol} node(s) filtered out (not supported by Clash Premium)

seoContent.title: Free Online Clash Converter - Convert Proxy Links to Clash YAML
seoContent.intro: ClashConverter is a free online tool that converts various proxy protocols (SS, SSR, VMess, Trojan, Hysteria, VLESS, HTTP, SOCKS5) into Clash YAML configuration format. This clash converter supports both Clash Meta (Mihomo) and Clash Premium kernels, making it the most versatile proxy to clash conversion tool available.
seoContent.privacy: All conversions happen directly in your browser - your proxy configurations are never uploaded to any server, ensuring complete privacy and security. This makes our clash converter the safest choice for converting your sensitive proxy configurations.

features.title: Key Features of Our Clash Converter
items: Support for 9 proxy protocols: SS, SSR, VMess, VLESS, Trojan, Hysteria, Hysteria2, HTTP, SOCKS5
Convert proxy links to Clash YAML format instantly
Convert Clash YAML back to shareable proxy links
Support for both Clash Meta (Mihomo) and Clash Premium kernels
Client-side processing - no server upload required
Bulk conversion - process multiple proxy links at once
Automatic proxy group generation with optimized rules
Mobile-friendly design - works on all devices
Free to use with no limitations or registration required

items.name: Shadowsocks (SS)
items.desc: Convert SS links to Clash format - supports AES, chacha20, and other encryption methods

items.name: ShadowsocksR (SSR)
items.desc: Convert SSR links with protocol, obfs, and other custom parameters

items.name: VMess
items.desc: Convert VMess links commonly used by V2Ray and V2RayN clients

items.name: VLESS
items.desc: Convert VLESS links - a lightweight protocol supported by Clash Meta/Mihomo

items.name: Trojan
items.desc: Convert Trojan links with TLS authentication

items.name: Hysteria
items.desc: Convert Hysteria v1 links with QUIC protocol support

items.name: Hysteria2
items.desc: Convert Hysteria2 links - the latest version with improved performance

items.name: HTTP Proxy
items.desc: Convert HTTP/HTTPS proxy links with username and password authentication

items.name: SOCKS5
items.desc: Convert SOCKS5 proxy links with or without authentication

howToUse.title: How to Use Our Clash Converter

steps.title: Paste Your Proxy Links
steps.desc: Enter your proxy links in the input box. Each link should be on a separate line. Supported formats include ss://, ssr://, vmess://, vless://, trojan://, hysteria://, hysteria2://, http://, and socks5://

steps.title: Select Your Kernel Type
steps.desc: Choose between Clash Meta (Mihomo) for full protocol support or Clash Premium for legacy compatibility. Clash Meta supports VLESS, Hysteria, and Hysteria2, while Clash Premium does not.

steps.title: Convert & Download
steps.desc: Click the convert button and your Clash YAML configuration will be generated instantly. You can then download the config file or copy it to your clipboard.

meta.title: Clash Meta (Mihomo) - Recommended
meta.description: The actively maintained continuation of Clash with support for all modern proxy protocols.
features: Used by Clash Verge, Clash Nyanpasu

premium.title: Clash Premium - Legacy Only
premium.description: The original Clash kernel. No longer actively maintained since 2023.
features: Use only if required by your client

items.a: Clash Converter is a free online tool that converts various proxy protocols (SS, SSR, VMess, Trojan, Hysteria, VLESS, HTTP, SOCKS5) into Clash YAML configuration format. It supports both Clash Meta (Mihomo) and Clash Premium kernels.

items.q: Is Clash Converter safe to use?
items.a: Yes, Clash Converter is completely safe and privacy-focused. All conversion happens client-side in your browser. Your proxy configurations are never uploaded to any server, ensuring complete privacy and security.
Clash Converter supports 9 proxy protocols: Shadowsocks (SS), ShadowsocksR (SSR), VMess, VLESS, Trojan, Hysteria, Hysteria2, HTTP, and SOCKS5. It can convert both to and from Clash YAML format.

items.q: What is the difference between Clash Meta and Clash Premium?
items.a: Clash Meta (Mihomo) is the actively maintained version that supports all modern protocols including VLESS, Hysteria, and Hysteria2. Clash Premium is the original kernel that is no longer maintained and does not support these newer protocols.

items.q: How do I convert proxy links to Clash format?
items.a: Simply paste your proxy links (one per line) into the input box. Each link should be in the format like ss://base64#name, vmess://base64#name, etc. Click "Convert" and the Clash YAML configuration will be generated instantly.

items.q: Can I convert Clash YAML back to proxy links?
items.a: Yes! Click the "Swap Direction" button to switch from "Proxies to YAML" mode to "YAML to Proxies" mode. Paste your Clash YAML config and the tool will extract and convert all proxy nodes back to shareable links.

items.q: Why should I use this clash converter?
items.a: Our clash converter offers the most comprehensive protocol support, works entirely in your browser for privacy, has no limitations or registration requirements, and is regularly updated to support the latest proxy protocols.

items.q: Does this work with Clash Verge and other clients?
items.a: Yes! The YAML output is compatible with all Clash-based clients including Clash Verge, Clash Nyanpasu, Clash for Android, Clash for Windows, and other clients that use Clash Meta (Mihomo) or Clash Premium kernels.

cta.text: Ready to convert your proxy links to Clash format?
